item.title: Hello World... Again!
item.description: pre code.sourceCode { white-space: pre; position: relative; } pre code.sourceCode span { display: inline-block; line-height: 1.25; } pre code.sourceCode span:empty { height: 1.2em; } .sourceCode { overflow: visible; } code.sourceCode span { color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit; } div.sourceCode { margin: 1em 0; } pre.sourceCode { margin: 0; } @media screen { div.sourceCode { overflow: auto; } } @media print { pre code.sourceCode { white-space: pre-wrap; } pre code.sourceCode span {
